title: Isolation and Connection
prompt: A weathered kitchen window in soft morning light, looking outward toward a distant tree line and empty gravel road, with a coffee cup and pill bottle sitting untouched on the sillâ€”hands visible in the frame organizing mail or holding the window frame, the room behind reflected faintly in the glass. Shot from inside, composed to show both the intimate domestic space and the vast emptiness beyond, conveying quiet resignation and the texture of solitary rural life. Documentary color palette with muted greens and grays, natural window light casting long shadows across worn linoleum.
